entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon with flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls late this afternoon. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then clearing. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
